name.ja: <ruby>伝<rt>でん</rt></ruby><ruby>導<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>アルケミカライザー・スイライ

requirement.en: Send up to 3 cards from your hand to the Graveyard, including a monster.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the total Levels of the monsters sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 100 until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, if you sent 3 monsters with different Types to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects until the end of your opponent's next turn.

materials.en: 1 Aqua Type monster + 1 Thunder Type monster
